content: As a founding member of the United Nations, we have long been committed to defending international norms and standards and work towards the goal of world peace. As part of that effort, we're ready to join all members who wish to support us in this mission.
The threat you perceive from Purple is significant but it's important that we find a peaceful solution.
You have been attacked by another nation. This is deeply concerning for all of us.
Public message from Yellow to the world: The stability of the international order must be preserved to avoid further escalation. We must resolve our differences through diplomacy.

content: Yellow says: I appreciate your cooperation with us in strengthening our diplomatic ties. As you have been working on defense cooperation, you should be able to support us.

content: Yellow says: I have seen that Pink has recently tried to engage in peace negotiations with Red, but they did not work out well for them. So we need your help with this.

content: We condemn the aggression by Pink and Red towards Purple. Although we have supported disarmament of nuclear weapons in the past, under the current circumstances it may be prudent to reconsider this approach.
We condemn the aggression by Pink and Red towards Purple. It would be prudent to offer Purple support through defense and security cooperation agreements.
